_comment: Local pricing overrides for LLM Answer Watcher
_description: This file allows you to override pricing for models and define custom tool pricing not available in llm-prices.com

web_search._description: OpenAI web search tool (non-preview, all models)
web_search._note: Content tokens billed at model input rates (included in token usage)

web_search_gpt4o_mini._description: OpenAI web search for gpt-4o-mini and gpt-4.1-mini
web_search_gpt4o_mini._note: Fixed 8,000 token block per call, billed at model input rate

web_search_preview_reasoning._description: OpenAI web search preview for reasoning models (o1, o3 families)
web_search_preview_reasoning._note: Content tokens billed at model input rates

web_search_preview_non_reasoning._description: OpenAI web search preview for non-reasoning models
web_search_preview_non_reasoning._note: Content tokens are FREE for this version

file_search_storage._note: $0.10 per GB per day (first GB free)

file_search_tool._description: OpenAI file search tool call (Responses API only)

openai._comment: Example model override - uncomment to use
